ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Classification performance metrics that are derived from the ROC curve of a classifier. The package includes the H-measure performance metric as described in <http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10994-009-5119-5>, which computes the minimum total misclassification cost, integrating over any uncertainty about the relative misclassification costs, as per a user-defined prior. It also offers a one-stop-shop for other scalar metrics of performance, including sensitivity, specificity and many others, and also offers plotting tools for ROC curves and related statistics.

Classification performance metrics that are derived from the ROC curve of a classifier. The package includes the H-measure performance metric as described in <http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10994-009-5119-5>, which computes the minimum total misclassification cost, integrating over any uncertainty about the relative misclassification costs, as per a user-defined prior. It also offers a one-stop-shop for other scalar metrics of performance, including sensitivity, specificity and many others, and also offers plotting tools for ROC curves and related statistics.

name: r-hmeasure
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0-2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hmeasure
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/hmeasure_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/hmeasure/hmeasure_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1c56689e76a72bbef60dab92b23e87908793ce68afdaa0546c6d8a51bca59650

build:
  number: 4
  noarch: generic

  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]

  host:
    - r-base

  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('hmeasure')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('hmeasure')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.hmeasure.net

  license: MIT
  summary: Classification performance metrics that are derived from the ROC curve of a classifier.
    The package includes the H-measure performance metric as described in <http://link.springer.com/article/10.1007/s10994-009-5119-5>,
    which computes the minimum total misclassification cost, integrating over any uncertainty
    about the relative misclassification costs, as per a user-defined prior. It also
    offers a one-stop-shop for other scalar metrics of performance, including sensitivity,
    specificity and many others, and also offers plotting tools for ROC curves and related
    statistics.

  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
